attributes.action: MANDATORY CONSUMPTION OF A BANANA AT 3:21PM EACH DAY.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A banana must be consumed at 3:21pm each day in offices and schools throughout the UK. The banana consumption must be instigated by the call (by a designated banana technician); "3.2.1...BANANA TIME!"  Henceforth this national phenomenon will be known formally as "Banana time" or "3.2.1...banana time" 
This is not only good for morale in the workplace but also promotes healthy eating.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
